title: Skarner's update is useless on other maps
body:
In Aram, TT, and Dominion skaner is still skarner.  Do you guys even remember the game has other maps when tinkering with champs?  

Let's not forget that when skarner isn't near one of his crystals, he's still the old skaner.  Ganking?  Old skarner.  Defending base?  Old skarner.  Needed on places that aren't those six places?  Still the old skarner.

replies.body: Skarner gets crystals on other maps too.

I honestly find the crystal thing pretty odd. I don't feel like giving him another passive will change much, and while it could help him invade, I still worry that it won't actually affect the game at all.

I do too but I can wait and see on that part.  Skarner is one of those champs riot never seems to be able to get quite right so it's hard to hate the change completely or love it completely as you never know if it'll be there in his rework next year.
Yeah, I like Skarner but he's never played. The bug needs more love...
From everyone I've talked to, his kit is basically a mess and his ult is a strictly worse version of other jungler's delete a carry ult.

I would disagree. The problem is that people try to play him as a tank, or go full damage when he's best built (in my opinion) as an AP bruiser. As a bruiser, he does great sustained AOE damage with Q. His W actually shields him for a meaningful amount, but he has resistances to back it up. His E is pretty much only there for the slow and the passive stack regardless of his build (if you're going to rework Skarner, I would look there first). His ult is actually pretty good. It's not for deleting carries. It's for locking them down and repositioning them. You can pull someone under a tower with it, or move the enemy ADC away from their team. It does decent damage, but that isn't its main purpose.

Do you ever PLAY Skarner?

You should try it, its actually really nice now that Runeglaive is a thing.  Rylai brings back old school skarner when his Q used to slow, paired with RoA and Runeglaive you never run out of mana unless you stay out of the jungle a long time,
It's an opinion. I build Runeglaive, one AP item, then tanky. It's worked most of the times I've done it.
Okay, that's better.  From the update it just mentioned SR.

Why are reworked champions being forced to play all these mini games just to be on level footing with their opponents? Cass? Soraka? Now Skarner?

This is getting a bit ridiculous.

>Why are reworked champions being forced to play all these mini games just to be on level footing with their opponents?

This question deserves its own thread.  There's a fine line between unique and annoying gameplay and sometimes I think riot is too eager to cross that line.

for real tho, the skarner update as of now doesnt work anymore.
it doesnt go with his lore. he isnt the survivor of a war at the crystal scar. he's a shuriman scorpion..

they specifically said that they were just giving a preview of their changes so far. it isnt all he's gotten.
just be patient.
The preview actually makes skarner worse in most cases.  It gives the enemy team a free boost in gold lvl1
15g per Crystal taken. There's a little bit of power there, but it's not going to decide anything significant.

so you could feed at most 45 maybe 60 gold to 1 enemy safely.  Do they lock after being captured like in TT?
It could accelerate the jungle a little.

Is the movespeed the trade off for not giving the allied side gold for capturing?

Top laner takes a camp, takes a crystal, and goes B then TP's to base. That's an extra health pot with the crystal + time to B.
